name: A Game with Zombies and Stuff
name_original: A Game with Zombies and Stuff
description:
What is this game?

Just a simple round-based VR zombie killing game. The further you go the harder it gets. The game works on all OpenXR devices.

Assets used:

Dynamic Cave Ambience
FPS Medieval Weapons
Free Night Sky
Grass Flowers Pack Free
Medieval Combat Sounds
Modern Zombie Free
Monster Sounds Pack
Mountain Trees - Dynamic Nature
Mixamo
Outdoor Ground Textures
Post-apocalyptic Truck with Armor
Street Bench
Terrain Sample Pack
Tinned Food
VR Interaction Framework
